Checkadverb - class Checkadverb.
This class contain the checknp1 and removekctp method it can identify Verb and VerbalParticle from Standalone words and Endpattern search and also identify Noun and Adjective, all are using morphological and heuristic rules
checkall() - Method in class Checkallnounphrase
checkall method can identify Nounphrase from Standalone words, case markers, tense marker,Endpattern search and startpattern search also identify Noun and verb, all are using morphological and heuristic rules

Checkfull method can identify Noun,verb,Adjective,Adverb,Verbal particible,Relative participle and Postposition from Standalone words, case markers, tense marker,Endpattern search,startpattern search and isequal search,all are using morphological and heuristic rules
Checkfullitem - class Checkfullitem.
